56.customerMessage1: Glacier Oak bed frame with shelved headboard and desk
56.AgentMessage1:
Sauder: I totally understand, finding the exact pieces you want can be really important for making your space feel complete.

Unfortunately, at the moment, we do not have a Glacier Oak bed frame with both a shelved headboard and desk together as one piece. However I do have a few very close options that might work depending on what you're trying to set up:

Here is a shelved headboard in Glacier Oak (full/queen):
https://sauder.attn.tv/arzAslmkISMA

And here's a desk in Glacier Oak that would pair nicely:
https://sauder.attn.tv/aagFQ_XDEbWP

For a bed frame option (Raven Oak finish):
https://sauder.attn.tv/a_uiivBuVaXs

I know it's not exactly the Glacier Oak bed + headboard + desk combo you described, and I can see why that's disappointing. Let me know what you think!

escalate: No CS for this client, ESC everything
When ESC post-purchase issues, only ask for the order number
If a customer wants to talk to customer service do not send PS, ESC instead
When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut before you ESC
When ESC on weekDAYS after 4pm EST, use WKE shortcut before you ESC
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo when customers misanswer the Welcome journey q's
templates: If cx are trying to upload a photo on the website and it's not coming through, use PWU shortcut
If cx are inquiring about delivery dates, use GRN shortcut
If cx share image/screenshot that's not showing don't ask to send again, use IMG shortcut
dos_and_donts: Prices vary, depending on height, not width
Wet Paint T shirts Inc is a different company
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend and share links for add-ons to cx
promo_and_exclusions: Contact us for help with fundraisers. Grad yard signs are only sold through fundraisers

escalate: ESC retroactive discount/price adjustment inquiries immediately
ESC if stylists/salons want to carry the products
templates: For any q's about affiliate links, commissions, or salon referral links, use AFQ shortcut
All of the products are unisex, use USX shortcut
drive_to_purchase: Ask the cx what their hair concerns are before making a recommendation!
Make recommendations when cx has specific inquiry, don't send the quiz!
For full haircare regimen inquiries, recommend shampoo, conditioner, and at least one or two other products recommended that align with their need
promo_and_exclusions: When sending a code provide more detail about what the code is valid for!
When sending the promo/code end date, include the time the offer expires as well!

60.AgentMessage1:
CLEARSTEM: I'm so sorry to hear that, Sarah! Please note that discount codes don't work with subscription items, as our system can't stack multiple promotions at checkout.

I did try applying the code on my end with one-time purchase items; however, it still didn't apply the full discount for the free mini bottle.

I want to make sure I give you the most accurate information, so I'll check in with my team. Since it's the weekend, I may not hear back until Monday, but I'll be sure to follow up with you as soon as I do!
